me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.time

Class Time

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.time.Time

  • public class Time
extends java.lang.Object
    A bunch of different utilities related to time. As a utility class, this isn't instantiatable. Very unfortunate, I know.
    Since:
    0.0.0
    Author:
    Colin Robertson

      • convert

        public static double convert(double value,
                             TimeUnit original,
                             TimeUnit target)
        Convert between two different units of time.
        Parameters:
        value - the value represented in original units.
        original - the original unit (to convert from).
        target - the target unit (to convert to).
        Returns:
        a converted measurement of time measured in target units.

      • fromNow

        public static double fromNow(double time,
                             TimeUnit unit)
        Get a time, in milliseconds, that's TIME units away from now.
        Parameters:
        time - the amount of time in units.
        unit - the unit the time parameter is measured in.
        Returns:
        a time, in milliseconds, that's TIME units away from now.
